website_summaries.verdict: It's a small bottle, yet it delivers plenty of potency to relieve inflammation in the ear.
pros: Doesn't contain antibiotics, so it's safer to use regularly
Works well with ear infections from bacteria, viruses, and yeast
Includes 1% hydrocortisone to ease the pain of the inflammation
cons: Has an odd consistency, meaning it may stick to the animal's fur around the ear

website_summaries.verdict: A gentle treatment for numerous types of persistent ear problems in dogs and cats that's made with natural enzymes.
pros: Treats recurrent ear infections caused by fungal, yeast, and bacterial infections with a trio of enzymatic ingredients
Made with a low dose of hydrocortisone that soothes symptoms and inflammation until issues are resolved
Well-tolerated by most cats and dogs with few side effects
cons: Severe infections may require a stronger treatment, but most pet owners who have used it rave about its effectiveness

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, works really good and fast
customer_reviews.text: I have a stray cat for almost 3 weeks now. I took him to a vetco bus to get his vaccines. The vet told me that he has ear mites and needs to go to vet clinic for ear drop prescription.that would be another little fortune. I checked Amazon, read reviews and gave this drops a shot. After only 3 days I saw a significant difference. His ears cleared really fast, the dark gulp started to dissolve and I realized that he wasnt scratching his ears as much. After one week there is almost no gulp to see. Iam very happy, saved alot, cat is also happy!!! :-)
customer_reviews.author: gülser akbas

customer_reviews.title: My dog war was cured in a week
customer_reviews.text: Last Friday my dog had a terrible yeast infection in his ear. I ordered this and it worked! His ear infection was cured less than a week
customer_reviews.author: cola09

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying Zymox for years but this isLot 180102 Exp: 01/2021. Don't bother opening it just send it back. It has the consistency of syrup and sticks to anything it touches. It leaves a sticky film on anything it touches including the person recleaning your pets' ears. This is the Blue box of ZYMOX Otic Enzymatic Solution HYDROCORTISONE 1% 1.25 fl. oz. bottle.
customer_reviews.author: searchtower

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY COUNTERFEIT PRODUCT NOT SAFE
customer_reviews.text: This is a counterfeit product. No lot # or exp date on package or bottle, the labels were hardly attached, the bottle itself is not the same as the one we get from the vet. We took it in and he compared the label with those he carries and the one on this bottle is different. Looks real but isn't. The wording is changed just a tiny bit and some things left off, like for veterinary use.
customer_reviews.author: gunny colvin

customer_reviews.title: Bad Batch
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product in the passed and it has worked great. This solution is normally a thick clear oil consistency, but this last order I received in January 2019 is clear water like solution. It also is not working and maybe making the ears worst. I must have received a bad batch. Also, there is no way to return so I'm stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Can cause deafness...
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to rid my dog of ear mites....My vet has speculated that this has caused her deafness as she has seen other dogs with the same treatment and results....BUYER BEWARE.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: sticky formula
customer_reviews.text: The formula has changed in 2019. Very sticky, syrup, sweet smell. Made my dog ears a sticky mess and worse! Manufactor will not respond! Update April 2019 I called the manufacture and they stated All Zymox products sold on Amazon are counterfeit. They do not sell on AMAZON. No LOT #. DO NOT BUY on AMAZON
customer_reviews.author: T. Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Try this before an expensive vet trip
customer_reviews.text: My poor pup had been scratching one of her ears and shaking her head for months and I wasn't sure what the problem was. It was getting to the point where she would yelp while she was scratching. The vet put some expensive gel in her ear that helped for awhile but cost me $100 and she didn't tell me what the problem was. After a quick Amazon search for dog ear treatment I found this and after just 3 applications my baby's ear has improved immensely.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Poison!
customer_reviews.text: Amazon should stop selling this product. The reviews are not true and I wish I had read the ones where people said their pet became deaf after using this. I tried this on my three cats, one in particular had diarrhea and became deaf from this. My dog also lost some of his hearing and it didn't help his ears at all. This should be taken off the market. I thought I was going to lose my poor cat from this product!
customer_reviews.author: Penny Lane

customer_reviews.title: Caused my dogs ears to scab up
customer_reviews.text: My yellow lab had brown debris and liquid coming from one of her ears although she had not been in the water. After reading reviews, I ordered this. After using it as directed for two days, my yellow lab's inner ear flaps were very scabbed over, red, and irritated. Will never use again. Maybe she's allergic, but I used same brand more than a year ago and had no problem. Don't know if the formula is changed, although the label has. So much better to get medicine from my vet that's a one-time insertion that works over two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Tumblewind

customer_reviews.title: It's not just hype... It really does work.
customer_reviews.text: It's only been a day and I can already see a visible difference in my dogs ear. I have a 1 yr old lab that has been having yeast ear infections off and on ever since we got him. Have been the diet route but have discovered it's mainly due to grooming and our other dog licking his ear. We usually take him to the vet which ends up costing us around 130-145 depending on swabs and everything else. I saw this on Amazon and decided to give it a try. I'll admit I was skeptical even after all the good reviews. But it has helped so far. Updated:::: added before and after photos.
customer_reviews.author: vicki47348

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: My dog has had chronic ear infections for years now. Every other month or so she’d get an infection and $200 later we’d have meds from the vet who confirmed what we already knew. I finally decided to give an unprescribed treatment a try and it worked AMAZINGLY. Followed the instructions for a week, and her ear is completely healed! Much easier to pay $20 as opposed to $200 when you get the same results! I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Fromal16

customer_reviews.title: Tampered with
customer_reviews.text: Bottle not filled with correct medicine. It is watery and not “glycerin-like” as in bottles past and has an alcohol smell. I believe it was tampered with and am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: N Hill

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased from Amazon. The product may be a fake and I was refunded, however, I already used it on my dog several times!!!! A mere refund is NOT enough!!! My dog experienced a horrible ear infection (I believe from the preventative use of this FAKE)...I should be compensated for the vet bill (over $350 for intensive antibiotic shots)!!! Whomever sold this counterfeit to Amazon should be held LEGALLY ACCOUNTABLE!!! My dog is lucky he can hear and lucky to not have permanent damage!!!! This experience has been VERY UPSETTING!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kokorunner

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately, did not help.
customer_reviews.text: My dog has been previously diagnosed with an ear infection from bacteria and yeast that keeps recurring. Gets black tar-like goo coming out of both ears. One ear is worse than the other . She tilts her head to the side and tries to clean with her paw. The vet's very expensive bills and medicine only works temporarily. After trying this product - Zymox Otic Enzymatic Solution for 7 days there is no improvement at all. I will continue until the bottle runs out or 14 days. I followed the instructions exactly. Still searching for cure. Any advice greatly appreciated!
customer_reviews.author: Urban Cowboy

customer_reviews.title: Mixed bag... some sellers have spurious Zymox product
customer_reviews.text: I buy this product regularly from Amazon, but no more. I've never had a problem until now. From the moment I opened this latest order, I could tell something was off. It looked repackaged. The decal on the bottle was haphazardly placed and the tip looked like it had been reattached. The liquid inside was watery and NOT like Zymox. It also smelled more like oil. Now that I'm reading some of the 1-star reviews, it makes sense. This is a spurious/counterfeit product. I've been buying Zymox from Amazon for years. This was clearly rebottled and relabeled. NOT genuine. I almost put this random oil into my dog's ear. Not cool.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for my dog
customer_reviews.text: My dog started scratching his ears a lot and then shaking his head all the time, which he never does. He had been on antibiotics for 6 weeks prior and I think that had something to do with it. I had been trying to clean them to make it better but it didn’t help and there was always a lot of gunk. I ordered some homeopathic drops first which irritated him more. After that I ordered these and within 2 applications I could tell it was working. We finish the week tomorrow and he hasn’t been scratching or shaking his head at all. Glad we didn’t have to go to the vet and that he got relief. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is a miracle!
customer_reviews.text: We have two Springer Spaniels. Our female, in particular has suffered with chronic ear infections for well over a year. She digs & scratches at her ears. She tilts her head. She cries when her head is touched in the wrong spot. It's been awful. We have tried everything. Natural remedies, prescriptions, even other products found here on Amazon. THIS. This is the only thing that has worked. Took a few days to see full results, but she finally, finally has relief. I am so happy! Our male also has the occasional flare-up, so we'll be keeping this stuff on hand indefinitely. Hands down. I highly recommend. 100%
customer_reviews.author: Beth P

customer_reviews.title: Works Wonders!
customer_reviews.text: After bringing our puppy to the vet several times and spending several hundred dollars on ear mite treatments. The vet said we weren't cleaning the dogs ears properly and that was the reason he was shaking his head all the time. We clean his ears 2 times a week. I knew it had to be some type of irritation in he was having. I decided to give this product a try before bring our puppy to a different vet. So happy I tried this product. After just one course of this product his ears were great and this has been 2 1/2 months ago.
customer_reviews.author: Dukeis

customer_reviews.title: Carful where it comes from.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered from amazon, shipped and sold from amazon. Got an email about a refund due to counterfeit products. Mine seems real enough but now I can’t use it for risk to my dog.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Ear mites.
customer_reviews.text: First and most importantly here is a photo of my dog because this is also a platform to share those. Second, these stuff is INCREDIBLE. I’m telling you if you are having problems with ear mites like I was (or ear enemies as we called them because you keep your friends close and your enemies in your your ear) you need this stuff. She had so many ear mites. They wouldn’t go away. I used everything. They kept coming back. I used this for a few days and they’re gone. May the force be with you.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff for Mites or ear fungus.
customer_reviews.text: My poor old cat had mites and an ear infection of some sort that got completely out of hand. Almost the whole ear canal on both sides was blocked with what was either nasty ear wax or some kind of fungus due to ear mites. Within 4-6 days of use it was all gone. She hasn't heard this good in a long time. It is a little gross when the shake the goo out of their head because its like little snot balls youll randomly find in their fur. But worked wonders to clear everything out.
customer_reviews.author: BuddyLoveNH

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit, avoid!
customer_reviews.text: Update: the reason this stuff dumps out too fast is because it’s not actually Zymox. No idea what it is, but it’s counterfeit. Total screw job, go over to Chewy and buy the real deal. I’ve used this product for a couple of years and it works really well. I ordered the larger size this time and it dumps out way too fast, overfills the ear and gets everywhere. Not very cost effective when so much lands on the floor. I’m going to get the smaller size and use the larger to refill.
customer_reviews.author: GFX

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the ear infections away
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the ear infections away. Every week or so I check my kitty's ears to make sure they're clean, if not I use this and it keeps his ears squeaky clean and him very happy. This has saved me hundreds in vet bills and my baby discomfort. I've reordered a few times now and have used this for about 6 years. Be careful of the expiration dates because a bottle lasts a long time for me. I had to send one back with an expiry date a few months out. the standard should be at least 2 years on expiry dates
customer_reviews.author: PaniniChowder

customer_reviews.title: Our vet said "keep using this"
customer_reviews.text: We have a Dane with natural ears. As with most dogs with fold over ears cleaning is important and problems are not unheard of. The product my vet provided was a lot more money and a small bottle for a BIG price. During a recent visit he noticed that our girl's ears were nice and clean and not bothering her and asked what we were using. Our vet said "keep using it." Our only suggestion is for the bottle design. You need a longer dispenser, especially on a large dog who is not a fan of having her ears fussed with. I will keep this on hand - good product.
customer_reviews.author: PA

customer_reviews.title: Questionable product
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this product many times and Amazon just advised me that the product I received was counter fit. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Chairman of the Board

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried I was going to have to take our dog to the vet. Both of her ears were infected. It looked like a yeast infection from everything I read. She would yelp when you touched her ears. After the first use of these drops, the ears started to clear up. They completely dissolved all of the black build up from the infection. After the 7 days of use, her ears were completely cleared up. So glad I ordered these!
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Montoya

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: After 5 days, ears are worse than before treatment. Will update review after another week or so if they improve. Suspect fake positive reviews from other users. Used for 14 days, ears still red and goopy. Will end up doing antibiotics from the vet which work temporary, but better than this junk. Can't trust reviews on Amazon any more lots of fake reviews
customer_reviews.author: Swesnw

customer_reviews.title: Amazon's Price Versus Vet's
customer_reviews.text: My Beagle has a recurring problem with her ears. I purchased this item before from Amazon and used it all. At vet's visit today I was "given" a bottle for $39.60, BIG difference in price. It does work good though. I put it in her grossly wax filled ears and they were improved within minutes. i really like the fact that you don't have to clean the ears first. Just put the drops in, massage, and wipe excess - then she rolls all over the deck rubbing the drops in further - works for me! Poor dog has severe allergies. We have pills and drops so hopefully she should be feeling better. These drops will surely help.
customer_reviews.author: A Grateful Heart

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have a bull mastiff who gets mild ear irritations and infections every time she gets any kind of water in her ears. I do clean her ears regularly but after bathing it always seems to be a problem. I dry her ears out well but it never seems to work. This stuff is amazing and clearing up her Almost overnight Brownish ear goo build up LOL that keeps her fussing at her ears and shaking her head. It’s recommended for use for seven days but it usually clears after four. Highly recommend this product. Love the cleaner also.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Zerbe

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY CAUSED MY DOGS TO GO DEAF
customer_reviews.text: I used this product on two of my three dogs and both went deaf after one month of application. I would never recommend this product as this has permanently ruined our dogs lives.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Cured! Chronic Ear Infection - A True Miracle
customer_reviews.text: My mastiff has suffered chronic ear infections since birth. Dark, smelly, yeast-like discharge. I tried everything I could find: over the counter and vet prescriptions (herbal treatments, rinses, ointments, antibiotics, steroids, special diets). Nothing worked. My dog hates having his ears messed with - especially rinses. This product does not require a rinse or invasive digging around in the ear. Just apply a small amount and massage the outside of the ear to work it into the ear canal. after 2 weeks of daily use, his ears look brand new. His spirits are up and I have never seen him happier. At this point, I think he looks forward to the once a week maintenance treatments. One and done. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. A.

customer_reviews.title: Purchased For My Dirty Eared Pug
customer_reviews.text: My female pug continuously has dirty dark brown discharge/wax in her ears that comes back within 2 days of being cleaned. I had her ears swab tested by the Vet and was told she tested fine, just has dirty ears. Her ears do not smell, nor do they seem to bother her any. I began by using this product as recommended, once daily for 1 week then once a week after that. They do seem to stay cleaner much longer than before. This product has a pleasant clean smell, it doesn't seem to bother her much when I use it either.
customer_reviews.author: Hannahrain

customer_reviews.title: Best ear products for dogs. Work fast!
customer_reviews.text: Best for ear infection, or irritation. My Crocker Spaniel was having and ear infection. Didn't want to take her to the vet. Since they charger a fortune. We decided to give it a try since it was a beginner ear infection. From the first used we saw a HUGE change on her ear. We are on our 4th day and it look like nothing ever happen, it clean, and she hasn't scratch her ears at all. Amazing price would definitely buy again if we need too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for my dog
customer_reviews.text: My dog had a yeast infection in her ear so I got this to avoid a big vet bill. I used this for the full 14 days and the infection seemed to get better but then afterwards it came right back so I took her to the vet where they said it was still infected with yeast and gave me drops that work.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: My doodle loves these because they work!!
customer_reviews.text: My sweet doodle use to struggled with nasty ear funk, plus she likes swimming in our pool. We had tried everything and cleaned her ears regularly. Nothing would help until we tried Zymox. She actually gets excited when I get these drops out. She doesn't shake her head or paw at her ears when we put them in, I think they soothe her ears. Now when we clean her ears....no more nasty funk. Her ears have never been better!! BUY THESE, THEY WORK!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: This product worked great!!! easy directions, worked wonders!!! My cat had the worst ear infection from mites I’ve ever seen, I was sure I would have to take her into the vet. I’ve tried other products in the past as my cat intentionally rolls around in filth some times, and nothing has worked this great before. In 3 days she was feeling better & perky, instantly it looked better after a thorough clean & after a week she is back to her old self! Great stuff.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: It didn't work for my dogs, and I truly believe this FAKE "made in USA" product!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product made my dogs ears worse than before I applied the drops on them. After a month using this product, the dogs ears were still NOT healed/cured - constantly in red "hot heat", wet, somewhat a very smelly bad odor and clogged. Too bad I can't return this fake product now because I wasted one month (free 30-days return period) trying & thinking it will work, eventually. I will not recommended this seller and their products. PS: I bought the same exact brand and products from "Chewy.com" last month in June - Guess What!? It work wonderfully and their products are MADE IN USA because my dogs ears are healed/cured at the moment - YAY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Lee

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS
customer_reviews.text: I got this because my dogs ear had this gunk in it. He had other symptoms like shaking his head and trying to itch at it. You could tell it was irritating him. I used it once daily for a week. Before applying it in his ear, I used hydrogen peroxide on tissue/toilet paper and cleaned the gunk out best I could. Every day I noticed there was less and less in his ear. The hardest part was putting the drop in his ears because my dog is a pain in the butt. Anyway, I got it done and thanks to this product my dogs ear is much better. I’ve attached a before and after picture!
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure exactly what was wrong with our 6 year old Boxer's ear. At first, I thought it was a stubborn case of mites. But, then I noticed the swabs had a yellowish substance on them. So, I looked it up and discovered it could be a bacterial or yeast infection. So, I saw the good reviews for this product and decided to try it, despite the high cost. Well, it was definitely worth it! I actually noticed a difference after the first application! It has now been six days and the swelling in her ear is totally gone and the infection seems to be 99% gone! Very happy with this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: large bottle has more secure application
customer_reviews.text: This time I ordered the 4 oz bottle of Zymox. I have an American Bulldog who has "allergy ear" problems that can translate to ear discomfort, itching, scratching and ear infections if not constantly treated. Aside from keeping her ears clean with ear wipes, Zymox definitely clears up any irritation/infection that develops. I have had difficulty with the applicator cap on the smaller bottles popping off and wasting the medication--which is pretty darned expensive when you are wasting it--not to mention that fact that you can end up without any left. The larger bottle has a screw-open top that stays put which is much more sensible.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Nine months of vets and cultures and prescription RX and this is the only thing that worked!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is pretty amazing in my experience. My poor cat had air infections nonstop for nine months. She went to a specialist she had cultures taken she was put on two different antibiotics several times and had an antibiotic shot and it would not go away! Her acupuncturist sold this to me as she is more into natural products and low and behold it worked! It only took a couple of times and then I repeat about a week later and it was gone! The challenges of course filling up your pets air canal rubbing it and then letting them shake their head to get rid of the excess says so I suggest doing it outside.
customer_reviews.author: CAKatwoman

customer_reviews.title: A must have for my dog
customer_reviews.text: I have a German Shepherd who has allergies. She gets ear infections /ear discomfort on a regular basis. Normally it occurs in the middle of the night. She does not like to go to vet and the prescribed ear drops are oily and makes a mess of her fur. Zymox does a great job and gives her almost instant relief. It clears up really quickly. I always have it on hand for those middle of the night emergencies.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hall

customer_reviews.title: It works!! Read the directions and follow the procedure for 7-14 days. Do not miss a day.
customer_reviews.text: Does your dog scratches their ears and face until they bleed? If you smell their ears does it smell bad? Try Zymox. Treat both ears. Fill the ear canal full and rub their ears against their head. The dog will not like it at first, but by the end of the 7 days mine would lay down for treatment. For severe cases you may go 10-14 days. I thought I would have treat my boxer longer, but it worked in 7 days. Her ears no longer smell. It has been several months and we have not had any more issues with her scratching her face and ears. We tried the Vet recommended ear solution previously and it did not work.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Saw improvement within the first couple of days
customer_reviews.text: We noticed my dogs ear was red and inflamed and when we tried to clean it she cried. I started searching for a product I could try before spending hundreds at the vet. This had great reviews so I figured I'd try it. After 3 days there was significant improvement. The redness and heat was completely gone and the black junk was majorly reduced. I am now on day 7 and she voluntarily comes to me when I have the bottle so I know she feels better. I have another smaller dog with long hair that leads to chronic ear infections. I will be using this regularly now to help prevent or reduce them. This stuff is definitely recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Works better than what the vet gave me
customer_reviews.text: My kitties had mites so bad that they were scratching wounds around their ears... After a month, 2 vet visits, drops and antibiotics, I wasn’t getting anywhere. I ordered this product based on reviews, and after using it 1 time, I got a ton of gunk out. After 3 days, their ears are almost completely clean, and they stopped scratching. Now I’m on day 5, and they are about 85% clean. I am so pleased with this product that I plan on buying the large size for maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Walker

customer_reviews.title: Saved Us A Trip To The Vet
customer_reviews.text: My pup has skin allergies and frequently gets yeast in her ears. I could see an ear infection coming on and hurried up and ordered this product. It came in two days and after using it for three days the itching and redness was gone. I kept using it for several more days to be sure it had cleared up and I'm keeping the remainder on hand for the next time.
customer_reviews.author: KayTee

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy if you care about your pets
customer_reviews.text: Thought this would help my dogs ears but just received an email from amazon that this product is counterfeit!!! So pissed
customer_reviews.author: Roro

customer_reviews.title: counterfeit
customer_reviews.text: My cat keep scratching her ear which has some black spots inside. I bought this to use on her ear and after two applications she got REALLY sick and did not eat for a week. I thought she was going to die. Lo and behold, Amazon emailed and said it was fake and refunded me. I'm so pissed off. Whoever produce a fake item that can kill pets should be put in jail.
customer_reviews.author: Jaycee

customer_reviews.title: Knocks down bacterial ear infection quickly
customer_reviews.text: I just spent months running back and forth to the vet for refills on antibiotic ear drops for bacterial ear infection in my dogs ear. The drops had a markup of over 300 percent. The drops weren’t working and then I remembered using Zymox on my first dog. Within one day, the infection was reduced. My dogs ears are almost clear and I’ll keep monitoring. But this stuff is just great and I highly recommend it. Enzymes seem to break down the bacterial biofilm really well. I could have saved a bundle if I tried this solution first.
customer_reviews.author: M. Chilton

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: My dog has terrible allergies so along with it comes ear troubles. My vet is completely booked during this quarantine so I figured I’d see if I could treat it myself before I spent extra dough on an emergency visit. This cleared it up by day 4! But I still finished out the whole 7 days. Before the treatment he was holding his ears up scratching and constantly shaking his head. Now he’s completely back to normal! Yay! Also he really didn’t like me touching his ears because they hurt. But this small bottle and oily texture made it very easy to do!
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic odor free product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this based on other reviews This product does NOT disappoint. My Cock- A-Poo suffers from chronic ear infections and hates drops. This works GREAT! No trip to the Vet ( and expense!) to find out what you already know and that is that yes indeed it’s another ear infection! There’s no odor to this product and it goes in more like a gel than a liquid. It’s the ONLY ear medication I have given that my dog doesn’t mind. Normally I have to chase her around. And it works even better than the meds we get from our vet. Very happy! Thank you for a great product! And it lasts awhile too- so you can keep it on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Kate625

customer_reviews.title: Something was wrong with this bottle....
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought this product many times with great success....but this last bottle had a different consistentency and it has not worked well at all. Month plus later...trying to give it time to work completely as it always has in the past.... I’m looking for something else.
customer_reviews.author: MamaTMW

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product! Excellent for cleaning up mites and very soothing.
customer_reviews.text: After a terrible experience using Otomite, I was hesitant to try another product and wondered if I should just return this and go to the vet. I'm so glad I didn't! My cat's ears were suffering from a terrible mite problem and the Otomite left them red and crusty. He was miserable. I couldn't believe the difference after only one application of Zymox! Redness was gone in one day and the crustiness disappeared shortly after. We are almost rid of the mites and his ears are soothed and happy :) This stuff works miracles. Totally worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra M. 😸

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Ear cream!! 🐕
customer_reviews.text: Let me say that I have tried so many different creams and sprays on my poo little chorkies itchy ears. Which she seems to get every summer really bad... I carefully read the reviews and decided to try this one out. It was great! The smell was subtle and a little bit goes a long way. After a few days I could see that it was working. We used it for about 5 days. Thank goodness, i felt so bad that she was scratching all day, now I've only seen her scratch once this week! I HIGHLY recommend it! Thank you seller for this Amazing Ear cream!!
customer_reviews.author: Mamma Bear

customer_reviews.title: Very Successful Ear Treatment
customer_reviews.text: After several unsuccessful (and expensive) trips to the vet to solve my Yorkie's ear infection problem, I tried Zymox as a last resort. Much to my surprise, it worked, and worked very fast. It cleared his ears in less than a week. He stopped scratching and shaking his head. The infection was gone. Now, I use it several times a week as a preventative measure. Better yet, my Yorkie isn't bothered by the application. He seems to like it, in fact. A small bottle lasts a long time, so it's a good value for the price (especially compared to the expense of going to the vet). I've reordered Zymox twice now, and recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: David L. Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver.
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness, this is a lifesaver. My dog had been scratching his ear a lot, and it got to the point he was bleeding, and the skin was red, bumpy, inflamed. He was constantly shaking his head and trying to scratch more, and I felt so terrible because I couldn’t help him. I also got concerned that it would develop into hematomas. We’re on Day 3 of this, and you can see the significant improvement in the before/after. His scratching and head shaking was reduced almost immediately on Day 1 application. Day 3, a lot of the redness is gone. This saved me from a vet appointment, and potentially having been told he needs allergy shots.
customer_reviews.author: Anna C.

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!! Cleared up his ear infection in 1 application!
customer_reviews.text: Way cheaper than the vet and it actually works! My Boston had a yeast infection in one of his ears. I was about to go to the vet, but I tried this first and with only one application, it completely cleared up. I was very skeptical but was completely amazed at the results. My dog stopped itching after that first application and the next day he didn't itch his ear at all - major relief for a concern furbaby parent!
customer_reviews.author: Brad Leese

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best!
customer_reviews.text: Cory Cat has had chronic ear mite problems for years. Even after using Revolution for several years. After the second day I could see a improvement in the ears and his behavior regarding them. After 7 they were clear! I continued for 14 days to be certain I had a handle on the problem. Cory actually wanted his ears to be treated, I don't think he wanted me to stop. Now that they are clear I'll keep a eye on them. Great product I only wish I had found it years earlier rather than the junk from Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Finally, no More Ear Infections!
customer_reviews.text: I was spending so much money at the vet for repeated ear infections on my floppy eared dog. I changed his diet, cleaned ears regularly and still couldn’t avoid the constant production of yeast. Then I tried this ear cleaner after reading reviews and my dogs ear infections are gone before they really get started! First sight of red ears or head shake I put this solution in his ears and a day later he’s fine. I told my friends about this and their stories are just like mine, we can’t believe we aren’t battling weeks long ear infections anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Saved us hundreds of dollars
customer_reviews.text: My charles spaniel gets ear infections every other month and the vet says “take these prescription drops and antibiotics, that will be 400” Or buy these drops that work just as well. At first i wasnt squeezing enough but after 3 days of really using a lot the infection was gone. Save your self money, time, and doggie stress.
customer_reviews.author: Nate A

customer_reviews.title: it works!
customer_reviews.text: My puppies has been scratching all the time, first thing came to my mind was they have fleas and ticks, I've used every itching spray or lotion or shampoo, it doesn't help at all, I also bought ear wipes but they still scratching.. So I finally give this a try ZYMOX Pet Ear Treatment with Hydrocortisone,,,,2 drops in each ear within an hour I see results! All I'm saying is this works for my dogs and I see results right away..you should give it a try. Oh I even give them itch relief from Pet Lab and it didn't help either....I guess they have develop yeast in their ears.
customer_reviews.author: poom pui

customer_reviews.title: It works on yeasty dog ears!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dog who is prone to yeast ear infections as part of his breed. To be honest I was fed up with vet visits every 1-2 months and paying for antibiotics repeatedly. The item arrived quickly and appeared to begin working within 1 day of use. My dog appeared to get some immediate relief as evidenced by his scratching at his ear less within 2 hours of the first application. The product had no significant odor or color, but the residue is a little sticky and you will need to wash your hands after applying it. For the price and effectiveness I am very pleased, as is my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Joan  M Thompson

customer_reviews.title: It works and it lasts
customer_reviews.text: This product works just as it claims. It’s the only thing that has ever helped my cats ears- she gets really yeasty ears from treats etc. they’ve never bothered her but they just look gross so I was always cleaning them. I cleaned them and used this for three days and they were perfect for weeks. Now every couple of weeks I just use this for one day and it’s worked to keep them looking great!! I wish I had taken before and after photos because it’s unbelievable. I didn’t even realize there was a product that could help and she’s just dealt with the ear cleanings for four years ugh buy this stuff for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Becky54

customer_reviews.title: Miracle worker
customer_reviews.text: My pug has been battling ear infections for months now. We’ve tried various treatments including antibiotics and ear treatments and cleaning by our vet. All of which worked but only temporarily. His ears were literally swollen shut and he was obviously hard of hearing. It was very obvious he was so uncomfortable. His ears smelled so bad they would stink up an entire room (no joke). This stuff had great reviews so I figured I’d give it a shot and I’m so glad I did. Yes it’s expensive but it works better than all the things we’ve tried. It’s less expensive and works better than anything the vet was able to do.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: treats ear infection within a week
customer_reviews.text: noticed my german shepherd scratching his ears a lot and when i took a look at his ears they were really gunky. googled the symptoms and decided he had an ear infection and this sounded really promising from reviews so we got it. it didn't disappoint! we followed the instructions and didn't try to clean his ears other than wiping off excess liquid and sure enough after just 5 days, it looked like it was already cleared. we still did it for the full 7 days just to be sure though. saved us a trip to the vet, highly recommend this
customer_reviews.author: vcw

customer_reviews.title: EAR INFECTIONS?
customer_reviews.text: I've bought Zymox products again and again over the years. If your dog or cat has an ear infection this is a must purchase. If they have a hot spot - the spray and cream is a must purchase. I have told so many people about zymox. I even used it on my own foot because no other meds (including Rx) helped. This stuff is like magic. I will go no where without it. Read about their enzyme in it. Read up on this and their other products. It will save you a TON of money on vet bills. A TON. It saved my dogs from having ear surgery. Seriously look into these products and educate yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Great for my mastiff...will surely work for your pup.
customer_reviews.text: My rescue English Mastiff had prescription drops that cost a fortune and did nothing for him. Mastiff's big ears are like leather tents: they hold heat and moisture and it can be hard to deal with their ears. I changed his diet (a big cause of ear issues) and began using Zymox. Best product for him. Now I only administer as needed: hot, humid days (Michigan) or if he happened to get them wet. Turned him around in under 2 weeks. Important to get the "plus" with the hydrocortisone, which eases inflammation. Definitely recommend. Safe and effective.
customer_reviews.author: Amadeus

customer_reviews.title: Not for chronic infections!
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working. :( unfortunately ZYMOX doesn't work long term. It says it is good for chronic ear infections, however that just isn't true. My pug is prone to both seasonal and food allergies. While I took care of the food, I cant stop the seasons from changing. ZYMOX used to work great. My dog with get an infection, 2 weeks of ZYMOX boom all cleared up. However after about a 2 years and 4 ear infections the process does not work. I even tried using it for a month straight (as the website advises) and the infection remains. So I say give it a try if your dog is new to ear infections, but dont expect long term use.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Joseph Design

customer_reviews.title: Worked more quickly than the Vet's drops.
customer_reviews.text: My cat's recurring ear infection/mites started acting up again and I decided to try some over-the-counter treatments before going back to the vet for more antibiotic drops. This stuff works great. It's unscented, is easy to apply because it's thick, more like an oil rather than water, and has hydrocortisone in it for immediate itch relief. Tried the Vetwell, too, and liked the Zymox much better. The Vetwell is a much larger bottle for about the same price, but is watery and way too strongly scented.
customer_reviews.author: happyshopper

customer_reviews.title: Try this before paying hundreds of dollars at the vet.
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my former dog and was thrilled with how it works. I bought this for my recently adopted cat who kept scratching at his ears. When I bought him to the vet for his shots the vet mentioned he had some wax in his ears which might be causing the itch. I already knew about Zymox so I immediately came home and ordered this. What I like is that it's all natural... no need to clean ears before using this once a day for 7 days. After using this for the required seven days my cat hasn't scratched his ears once. What a great product.
customer_reviews.author: A. ShertickTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: It works! Agree with other posters that this worked very well. My dog (boston terrier) had an ear infection. We went to the vet and received anti biotic drops which I used for 10 days and she seemed okay but in a couple of weeks she was shaking her head again. It also seemed that her other ear was bothering her. I used this for four days and she was much improved! No more scratching or head shaking. And saved me another $150 for a vet visit. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Emily M

customer_reviews.title: Great, affordable and effective!
customer_reviews.text: My senior dog has had chronic ear infections for years. After many vet visits, paying so much money on visits and antibiotics, only to have the ear infections reoccur, I tried this stuff. Reading all the reviews I was hopeful. Hoping it would work for my sweet senior. And..... it works!!!! I keep this stuff in the drawer at all times. Anytime my senior dog gets to shaking his head, or I see any of my dogs with an ear issue, I use this stuff and ta-da ear problems gone and the dogs are happy.
customer_reviews.author: LittleBuddha

customer_reviews.title: seems to work
customer_reviews.text: my sister is a vet and prescribed antibiotics and ear drops for my lab. he would get in the pool and get water in, and another dog would like his ears causing a infection. that took the swelling down and after a week medicine ran out and dog felt better, a week later it started irritating him again. I could tell because he was shaking his head a lot again. got these drops and after a few applications it seemed to help him and now 3 weeks later no reoccurrence yet.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Fields

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, it works!!!
customer_reviews.text: Since I have taken my baby to the vet for check ups and vaccines because he is a 2y rescued dog and I wanted to be sure he is ok to have a normal life at last, this product saves me from another expensive trip to the vet. The grooming lady told me about his ear infection and based on the reviews here I was almost sure this would work and it did work!!! I used it for 14 days as the instructions said for chronic eats as I assumed he had it for being a stray dog and bought an organic one to clean his ears on a daily basis. Seller, Dappy thanks you as well!!!
customer_reviews.author: July F

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders!
customer_reviews.text: I was very weary of this working on my boys ears. I have tried tons of stuff that has not helped, he has allergies and his poor ears looked horrible. I decided to give this a try after looking through the reviews and I am SO happy I did! By day 3 his ears looked amazing, definitely give this a try. I added some pictures of his ears from beginning till day 3. When I say I was blown away by how fast this stuff has helped his poor ears i absolutely mean it.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy M.

customer_reviews.title: Very Effective
customer_reviews.text: My dog kept getting infections in her left ear as the result of food allergies. The quarantine lockdown made it impossible to get her into the vet every time her ear acted up, and she was scratching her ear raw, so I bought this based on a recommendation. While we sorted out her diet, we used the ZYMOX drops, and her ear issues cleared up after just a few days. I still recommend going to the vet for medical issues, but this makes an excellent backup in an emergency situation.
customer_reviews.author: AstraDaemon

customer_reviews.title: Effective and Easy to Use!
customer_reviews.text: My miniature yorkie had terrible trouble with her ears. She is sensitive to allergies, and the reaction was always a reaction in her ears. This ear treatment worked after one application! Although it is effective, it does not irritate their ears. Now I use it on all of our dogs, and it really cures up ear problems. It is very easy to use. Just squirt into the ear, and massage the closed ear to move the solution around. That's it! After the problem clears up, maintain good health by using it weekly. I have purchased this four times, already, and I have never been disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Miracle product
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing, I am beyond ecstatic that I found it. My dog has big floppy ears and suffers from frequent yeast infections in them. The vet would give us prescription medicines but often they would make the symptoms better before they got worse. Her ears would get red and hot and she would scratch them until they bled. This product not only gets rid of the infection, but it is gentle while doing so and doesn’t seem to bother her one bit. I will never go without a bottle of this in my home <3
customer_reviews.author: adriana

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for us
customer_reviews.text: This did not work for us. I have followed the directions not cleansing the ear or disrupt the medication and this has not helped. I was very hopeful given the positive reviews. This didn't work for us unfortunately despite being very vigilant and using as directed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best things ever
customer_reviews.text: My pit baby seems to keep ear infections. To the point i was hesitant to keep using antibiotics because of fear of them doing more harm. I had tried everything under the sun to no avial and then saw these and tried them. Within 3 days her ears were clearer than they have ever been and have stayed that way. I also got some ear cleaning wipes that i use everyother day to keep them clean but shes going on 2 months infection free and thats the first time i can say that in the enitr tine shes been with us. So thankful for these i cant recommend them enough.
customer_reviews.author: G. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Save money on vet bills!
customer_reviews.text: I tried this based on the reviews and wasn't disappointed. This is a must have for anyone who has a dog with chronic ear infections. I was paying upwards of $150 each time I wemt to the vet, and I have two dogs so this get very pricey pretty quickly. I have been cleaning my dogs ears regularly and try to catch an infection when it first appears. I used it for 14 days and it fully resolved. I have at least enough to treat 1 to 2 more infections. I will never be without a bottle on hand. This stuff is truly amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew M. Sone

customer_reviews.title: Try this before heading to the vet...
customer_reviews.text: One of my dogs has severe allergies and gets ear infections often. I end up spending between $125-500 every 5 weeks for both dogs and all their ailments (I also rescued her litter mate that barely survived parvo and distemper which resulted in neurological issues). I randomly came across this product and based on the reviews I thought I’d give it a try before heading to the vet again. I’m so glad I did. Her nasty, smelly ears cleared up in just 3 days. This inexpensive product has now saved me hundreds at the vet. I highly recommend giving it a try before spending your money at the vet’s office.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle J

customer_reviews.title: It worked for me
customer_reviews.text: It worked as intended. Although my pups ears weren't as bad as some of these pictures, I knew there was an issue. I was cleaning them with a mix of apple cider vinegar and water which would offer relief. However, days later she was digging again. 7 days of use as directed and no more digging. It's been a month now, so I was say with a resounding yes, it works! Recommend
customer_reviews.author: ShepLady

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: My dog had extremely dark red ears, they looked painful, and he wouldn't leave them alone. I am not sure what exactly was wrong with his ears, he does have allergies but this didn't look like his typically allergy. I tried this product, and am very pleased. The drops themselves are very thick, my dog did not like it one bit. I did this once a day for about a week, but just after two days I saw a huge difference. The redness turned to pink, and it didn't bother him, then after a couple more days, the pinkness went away. His ears have been completely fine since.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my boys’ itchy, infected ears. This is the same product I buy at my vets. I was thrilled to find it on Amazon without a prescription! My basset/dachshund has infected ears occasionally. A couple of days of using this product clears it right up (2x daily). The price is about the same as vets, but I can skip the office visit fee. He appreciates that part the most! I also have a redbone/lab that is severely allergic to corn. His ears are the first to react if he accidentally eats a corn product. He clears right up within a week of 2x daily doses of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Northern woods

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: My dog’s left ear is filled with warts and it smells and has discharge sometimes. I’ve taken him to the vet many times but they won’t do surgery because he’s 16yrs old. So I cut the hair to keep the ear open and I clean it out and apply this product and my dog doesn’t scrstch at it as much as before and it keeps his ear from smelling. I am pleased with this product and I will be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Lizette

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: This helped clear my Rottie’s yeast ear infection. I have the worlds most allergic Rottie (ear infections and dermatitis) and this worked for him without causing additional issues. Our vet wanted to charge 250.00 to examine and dx and that’s without meds. After reading other reviews I decided to try this before spending those professional dollars. It worked in 7 days. The instructions state it can be used for 14 days if needed. I am pleased to report we are 1 1/2 month out and no wax build-up or yeasty smell. I did purchase the maintenance ear cleaning product to avoid this situation in the future. Pup and fur mom are happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's gooey thick but does the doggy good
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the product for 7 days now and plan to use it another 7 days to be sure my dogs ear mites are completely eradicated. My dog doesn't seem to mind having the thick gooey medicated syrup put into its ears. I have massaged the product into and up the ears. My dog seems to understand I'm doing this for its own good. There's a lot left in the bottle. A little goes a long way. My dog weighs 10 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Ataturk

customer_reviews.title: It works for my cat
customer_reviews.text: I had been using two other solutions to treat my cat’s ear mites. They did not work, and my cat hates them. It is not easy to apply those solution in my cat’s ear. This solution is amazing. First, my cat seems accept this jelly-style solution better. Second, it really works! I applied it to my cat’s ear for 2 weeks, stop for 1 week, then apply another 1 week. Now 95% ear mites are gone. There has just a little left. I plan to apply another week until the ear mites gone. Thank you for helping my cat!
customer_reviews.author: Yanlin Peng

customer_reviews.title: Stop paying Vet hundreds
customer_reviews.text: Try this product. It works so good and last for awhile. My dog has chronic ear infections. The vet bill was starting become a burden and the meds were not working. Finally, i started looking online and reading and found this product. NO MORE VET FOR INFECTIONS. I use this product for a few wks and as good as new...
customer_reviews.author: Kisha

customer_reviews.title: This product delivers
customer_reviews.text: I have a Great Pyrenees mix. When he gets an ear infection he hears things ... and barks at whatever he thinks he hears. This madness takes place in the wee hours of the morning and I was at my wits end until I found thei product. I loved that I didn't have to clean my dog's ear before using the product (he's over a 100lbs, fidgets and is sensitive about his ears). His ears were caked with dark junk from a yeast infection and in a matter of days this product took care of it. With a weekly maintenance treatment his ears are a healthy pink and clear of all infection waste.
customer_reviews.author: hulagirl2dance

customer_reviews.title: the ear mites literally slid off
customer_reviews.text: was trying home remedy with olive oil infused with garlic and it seemed to work. 1 week later it came back probably bcus i didnt apply it daily and got lazy. Tried this ear drop solution and holy cow the mites floated and started to slide out of my dogs ear. The following day, ear mites still present but fewer. 3rd day, ear mites are significantly less. I will continue daily treatment for 7 days then every other day the next week then once a week until bottle is empty. Will update this review after that.
customer_reviews.author: lycoon

customer_reviews.title: For my cat’s ear mites
customer_reviews.text: Took some time and persistence, but it did clear out my kitten’s ear mites. I applied 3 drops in each ear every night for the first week, then 2 drops every other night for the second week. He absolutely hated it, but he didn’t have any reactions whatsoever, just some head shaking which got rid of the excess. Also be sure to massage the back of the ear gently and give a few minutes before letting them run around again.
customer_reviews.author: Espe Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Safe to use on my pet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my little doggie had an infection in one of her ears. It is so difficult to get in to my vet during this pandemic (they won't even let me come in with her). They come get her and take her in and you don't even get to talk to your vet so I thought I would try this instead of going thru that and I am so glad I did. Easy to use and cleared her ear up in less than a week but I continued to use it anyway for the entire week. Worked really well.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Anna

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful stuff
customer_reviews.text: My poor Yorkie has allergies and seems to get an ear infection every time she gets a bath on top. We have fought it for years. When she gets to scratching her ears a lot or her ears become inflamed, I use this stuff once a day for a few days and she actually clears up for a few weeks. The prescription meds didn't do as well. Usually after a script for infection she would stay irritated and within a couple weeks be just about as bad. Tried it on my son's dog when her ears became irritated and it worked for her as well. I'll get more when we run out.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Incredible!
customer_reviews.text: After multiple vet trips and medications with no success, decided to give this a try. It's $40 just to walk in the door at my vet, plus meds, so it was definitely worth the money. I got the 4oz bottle and I still have some left over, but I don't think 2 oz would have done it for my dog (German Shepherd mix) Her ears went from a stinky, gooey, oozing mess to clean in just a WEEK. Just 3 days made a drastic improvement. LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS STUFF!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Williams

customer_reviews.title: Liquid gold for their ears
customer_reviews.text: This is a life saver. I was picking it up from my vet. Of course they wanted to see my dog every few times I needed a refill. I know what the problem is. I dont need a vet bill to tell me what I already know. Allergies are continuous in my home. There inevitably will be a flare. I always make sure to keep this in stock. I use it at the first sign of a head shake and typically only need to give it once. At this point my dog sees the bottle and comes and sits down in front of me. She knows there will be almost instant relief to her ear woes.
customer_reviews.author: Chivonne M.

customer_reviews.title: Beats my Dogs ear infection every time
customer_reviews.text: Aurora is a rescue dog and has battled with ear infections since we adopted her, this is the only product which makes a real difference! Works within 48 hours for her in general and we do check her ears often since it's an ongoing problem so we catch it pretty quickly. Love the difference this product has made in Aurora's life keeping her happy and well and comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this item I was afraid of wishful thinking and how wrong. First I was surprised how easy it is to use the product. Second, I was amazed and how effective Otic is. Our puppy is a cava poo. Apparently this bread is susceptible to an ear infections. Within eight days, he was cured. I cannot over recommend this product. Previously I had had a miniature poodle, years ago, With chronic ear problems—This product would’ve saved me a fortune.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Fox

product_meta.title: ZYMOX Pet King Brand Otic Pet Ear Treatment with Hydrocortisone
product_meta.description: Size:1.25 ozTrusted by Veterinarians since 1998. ZYMOX Ear Solution with hydrocortisone aids in managing problematic ears on all animals including dogs and cats of any age. The patented LP3 Enzyme System delivers a potent formula to maximize the power of this product, without traumatic pre-cleaning and application.1% Hydrocortisone is added for comfort. Use once daily for 7 to 14 days. For maintaining clean and healthy ears after the course of Ear Solution, use ZYMOX Ear Cleanser weekly. This product is proudly made in the USA. Animal Cruelty-Free and is never tested on animals. Item dimensions; 1.88"L x 1.13"W x 3.88"H, 1.25 Fluid Ounces (37ml).
feature_bullets: Ear care for dogs and cats - soothes ear infections, redness and inflammation for pets of all ages
Gentle no-sting formula helps ease painful ear infections caused by bacteria, fungi and yeast
Solution provides a safe, natural alternative to antibiotics with 1% Hydrocortisone for itch relief
No pre-cleaning of painful ears required - fill ear canal and let antimicrobial solution get to work
Patented antimicrobial LP3 Enzyme System helps clear ear secretions and promotes healthy ears
For treating inflammation of the external ear caused by bacterial, viral, and yeast infections
